sentences.english: This area also produces large quantities of tea and silkworms.
Of which, Nosema bombycis is a main pathogen to the silkworm, Bombyx mori.
sentences.chinese: 其中的桑蠶微粒子蟲也是桑蠶的主要病原微生物。

sentences.english: Of which, Nosema bombycis is a main pathogen to the silkworm, Bombyx mori.
sentences.chinese: 其中的桑蠶微粒子蟲也是桑蠶的主要病原微生物。

sentences.english: It has the advantages of both cashmere and mulberry silk.
sentences.chinese: 它具有羊絨和桑蠶絲兩者的優點。

sentences.english: The raw material of their dress is natural silk.
sentences.chinese: 紅瑤服飾的主要原料當爲桑蠶絲。

sentences.english: The silkworm silk in " Fu Run " trademark has been prized for Zhejiang Provincial Brand-Name Products Title.
sentences.chinese: 富潤牌桑蠶絹絲榮獲浙江省名牌產品稱號。

sentences.english: Mulberry silk at a good temperature performance, small thermal conductivity, winter and summer are advised to wear.
sentences.chinese: 桑蠶絲隔溫性能好，導熱係數小，所以冬夏穿着均宜。

sentences.english: “But if you look at a silkworm, it only has one kind of spinneret,” she added.
sentences.chinese: “但桑蠶只有一種吐絲器，”她補充說。
